definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: In this case, I'm going to plot a histogram.
sentences.chinese: 在這個例子中我會畫一個柱狀圖。

sentences.english: Borehole diagram is a kind of basic map in geological exploration works.
sentences.chinese: 鑽孔柱狀圖是工程勘察工作中的一類基礎圖件。

sentences.english: You can also scale line graphs with a similar approach to that used with a bar graph.
sentences.chinese: 也可以使用與柱狀圖類似的方法縮放線圖。
